name: Russia-Ukraine War
description: Full-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, the largest conventional war in Europe since WWII. Involves trench warfare, drone warfare, and extensive civilian casualties.

name: Israel-Palestine Conflict
description: Escalated conflict following the October 2023 Hamas attack and subsequent Israeli military operations in Gaza. Massive humanitarian crisis with tens of thousands of casualties.

name: Sudan Civil War
description: War between the Sudanese Armed Forces and the Rapid Support Forces. Has caused one of the world's worst humanitarian crises with millions displaced.

name: Myanmar Civil War
description: Multi-front civil war following the 2021 military coup. Ethnic armed organizations and peoples defense forces fighting against the military junta.

name: Syrian Conflict
description: Ongoing multi-party conflict involving the Syrian government, opposition forces, Kurdish groups, ISIS remnants, and foreign interventions by Turkey, Russia, Iran, and the US.

name: Yemen Conflict / Houthi Crisis
description: Long-running civil war between Houthi forces and the internationally recognized government. Houthis have expanded to Red Sea shipping attacks affecting global trade.

name: Ethiopia Internal Conflicts
description: Post-Tigray War instability with ongoing ethnic violence in Amhara and Oromia regions despite the 2022 ceasefire agreement.

name: Eastern DRC Conflict
description: Escalating conflict in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo involving M23 rebels backed by Rwanda, plus dozens of other armed groups fighting over minerals and territory.

name: Somalia - Al-Shabaab Insurgency
description: Al-Shabaab insurgency against the Somali federal government, with ongoing military operations and frequent attacks on civilians and government targets.

name: Sahel Jihadist Insurgency
description: Expanding jihadist insurgency across Mali, Burkina Faso, and Niger. Military juntas have seized power in all three countries, expelling French and UN forces.

name: Haiti Gang Violence Crisis
description: Near-total state collapse with armed gangs controlling much of Port-au-Prince. Massive humanitarian crisis with widespread displacement and food insecurity.

name: Taiwan Strait Tensions
description: Escalating tensions between China and Taiwan with regular PLA military exercises around the island. Considered one of the highest risks for great-power conflict.

name: South China Sea Disputes
description: Ongoing maritime disputes between China and Southeast Asian nations, particularly the Philippines, with frequent confrontations between coast guards and navies.

name: Korean Peninsula Tensions
description: Persistent tensions on the Korean Peninsula with North Korean missile tests, nuclear development, and reported troop deployments to support Russia in Ukraine.

name: Iran-Israel Shadow War
description: Escalating shadow war including direct missile exchanges, proxy conflicts through Hezbollah and Houthis, cyber warfare, and nuclear program tensions.

name: Afghanistan - Taliban Rule / ISIS-K
description: Taliban rule with ongoing ISIS-K attacks and a severe humanitarian crisis. Women's rights have been almost entirely eliminated. Economic collapse continues.

name: Pakistan - TTP Insurgency & Instability
description: Rising TTP (Pakistani Taliban) attacks, Balochistan separatist violence, and deep political instability following contested elections.

name: Armenia-Azerbaijan Post-War Tensions
description: Ongoing tensions following Azerbaijan's takeover of Nagorno-Karabakh in 2023. Ethnic Armenian population fully displaced. Border demarcation disputes continue.

name: Lebanon Crisis
description: Multi-layered crisis including Israeli military operations against Hezbollah, economic collapse, political dysfunction, and massive displacement.

name: Libya Political Division
description: Libya remains split between rival governments in Tripoli and Benghazi with competing armed forces. Oil infrastructure is frequently contested.

name: Iraq - Militia Activity & ISIS Remnants
description: Iranian-backed militias conduct attacks on US bases, while ISIS cells carry out sporadic attacks. Political tensions between factions continue.

name: Colombia Internal Conflict
description: Despite the 2016 peace deal, FARC dissident groups, ELN guerrillas, and drug cartels continue to drive violence. Peace talks with ELN have stalled.

name: Mexico Drug War
description: Ongoing extreme violence driven by drug cartels, with tens of thousands of homicides annually. Cartel territorial battles and fentanyl trafficking are major crises.

name: Mozambique - Cabo Delgado Insurgency
description: ISIS-affiliated insurgency in Cabo Delgado province threatening natural gas projects. Combined with political crisis following disputed elections.

name: India - Kashmir / Naxalite Conflicts
description: Ongoing tensions in Indian-administered Kashmir with militant infiltration and security operations. Maoist (Naxalite) insurgency continues in central India.

name: Cameroon Anglophone Crisis
description: Armed conflict between Cameroonian military and Ambazonian separatists in English-speaking regions. Thousands killed and hundreds of thousands displaced.

name: Venezuela Political Crisis
description: Ongoing political crisis following disputed 2024 elections. Maduro government crackdown on opposition. Economic crisis drives mass migration across the Americas.

name: Nigeria Multi-Front Violence
description: Multiple simultaneous crises: Boko Haram/ISWAP insurgency in the northeast, banditry in the northwest, farmer-herder conflicts, and separatist tensions.
